title: EXCLUSIVE Lopez Sr: BULL***T Loss vs Kambosos, Teofimo WON Every RD, Taylor NEXT!
author: SecondsOut
description:
EXCLUSIVE Radio Rahim interviews Teofimo Lopez Sr: BULL***T” Loss! vs George Kambosos, Teofimo Lopez WON Every Round, Josh Taylor NEXT!

localize.title: EXCLUSIVE Lopez Sr: BULL***T vs Kambososの敗北、TeofimoはすべてのRDを勝ち取り、Taylor NEXT!
独家报道：老洛佩兹 在与Kambosos的比赛中输得一塌糊涂，Teofimo赢得了每一场比赛，泰勒是下一个!
獨家報道：老洛佩茲 在與Kambosos的比賽中輸得一塌糊塗，Teofimo贏得了每一場比賽，泰勒是下一個!
